bike.description: A1 Premium Aluminum, Freeride HT/Dirt Jumping/Street MTB design, Centerfold TT, butted and manipulated DT, forged and relieved HT, forged BB shell w/ integrated ISCG tabs, forged horizontal dropouts, integrated derailleur hanger, canti bosses and disk tabs, asymmetrical 6mm offset rear triangle

components.description: Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Disc specific routing, owners manual, derailleur hanger,  chain stay/seat stay protector
